general_feeling: Led to a lot of shifty looks from Strangers. I was definetly conscious of them most of the time.
challenges: Entering any public space made me feel like I had to explain myself, so there wouldn't be any misunderstandings.
act_impact: Basically all of the time. People were giving me looks, sometimes directly asking me whether I was filming them.
beh_adapt: I didn't change my behaviour at all.
social: yes, quite a lot. To the Point where I saw no reason to log them anymore, as I frankly didn't have that much time to spend.
improvements: I'm not a technician, but if there is a way to make it look less like a camera, that would bei super helpful and circumvent a lot of awkward interactions.
